entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
